channel.title: Cache missing file problem
channel.description:
I am using deathlypvpz v4 [pi] client when I try to run it says
[code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: null\Deathlypvpzv5\Data\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The s ystem cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:172) at client.startUp(client.java:8298) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:84) at client.run(client.java:5287) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:724) [/code]
I have downloaded manually the cache and extracted it on my C:/ . I have went into data/maps/ and deleted mapconfig and did another save as mapconfig.txt and still no luck it keeps saying the same thing. I would appreciate if someone helped my skype: gayboy3331
